sub_fields.label: Caption Color Override
sub_fields.name: caption_color_override
sub_fields.instructions: If needed, you can change the background color of the captions.

sub_fields.label: Images
sub_fields.name: images
sub_fields.instructions: Images will be displayed at a 2000:916 aspect ratio.

sub_fields.label: Featured Posts
sub_fields.name: featured_posts
sub_fields.instructions: Select up to 4 posts to feature. If more than 4 are chosen they will be ignored. If less than 4 are chosen, they will be populated automatically by most recent.

sub_fields.label: Disable Autopopulate
sub_fields.name: disable_autopopulate
sub_fields.instructions: If this is checked and less than 4 posts are featured, the system won't autopopulate more posts.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Please keep your title short (10 or less words)
